headline: NextEra Energy's Q4 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Revenues Lag
summary: NEE tops fourth-quarter earnings estimates with strong segment growth, though revenues fall just short of expectations.

headline: A Look At Dominion Energy (D) Valuation As Steady Returns Meet Conflicting Fair Value Estimates
summary: What Dominion Energy’s recent performance tells investors Dominion Energy (D) has drawn fresh attention after a period where the stock’s month and past 3 months returns stayed in positive territory, while the past week showed a small decline. That mix of short term pullback and longer term gains, combined with the company’s latest revenue and earnings profile, is prompting some investors to reassess how the utility fits into a diversified, income-focused and stability-focused portfolio. headline: Resumed Offshore Wind Build And Dividend Declaration Could Be A Game Changer For Dominion Energy (D)
summary: Dominion Energy’s board recently declared a quarterly dividend of US$0.6675 per share, payable on March 20, 2026, to shareholders of record as of February 27, 2026, while a federal court granted a preliminary injunction in January allowing construction to resume on the Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind project amid ongoing litigation. The court’s decision lets Dominion Energy restart work on the 2.6‑gigawatt Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind project, a key component of its diversified energy...
